src:
NasDem Undang Anies Baswedan ke Kongres
01 Nov 2019, 11:40 by Mochamad Zhacky
Jakarta - Partai NasDem segera menggelar kongres. Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan diundang ke kongres tersebut.
"Anies memang kita undang sejak pembukaan ya. Nah, Ibu Khofifah (Gubernur Jawa Timur) juga kita undang," kata Ketua DPP NasDem Willy Aditya kepada wartawan, Jumat (1/11/2019).


Foto: Ketua DPP NasDem Willy Aditya (Tsarina/detikcom)

Dia mengatakan Khofifah diundang karena merupakan gubernur yang diusung oleh NasDem. Namun, Willy tak menjelaskan detail alasan Partai NasDem mengundang Anies mengingat saat Pilkada DKI Jakarta 2017, NasDem mengusung Basuki Tjahaja Purnama (Ahok)-Djarot Saiful Hidayat.
"Ya, kita ingin. Sebagai orang yang dekat. Kalau Ibu Khofifah kan kita pengusung utama," sebut Willy.
text:
NasDem Invites Anies Baswedan to Congress
01 Nov 2019, 11:40 by Mochamad Zhacky
Jakarta - The NasDem Party will soon hold a congress. DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan was invited to the congress.
"We have invited Anies since the opening, right? Well, we also invited Mrs. Khofifah (Governor of East Java)," DPP Chairman NasDem Willy Aditya told reporters on Friday (11/01/2019).


Photo: Head of DPP NasDem Willy Aditya (Tsarina / detikcom)

He said Khofifah was invited because it was the governor carried by NasDem. However, Willy did not explain the details of the NasDem Party's reason for inviting Anies, remembering that during the 2017 Jakarta Election, NasDem carried Basuki Tjahaja Purnama (Ahok) -Djarot Saiful Hidayat.
"Yes, we want to. As a close person. If Mrs. Khofifah we are the main bearers," said Willy.
